snippet: Newt Gingrich advised a major private equity firm, even though he is faulting Mitt Romney for his ties to that industry.
abstract: Newt Gingrich advised a major private equity firm, even though he is faulting Mitt Romney for his ties to that industry.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and JIM RUTENBERG

headline.main: Gingrich's Own Close Tie to Buyout Industry
